content: >this pattern is available for downloading also on payhip 1 with a pay what you want option villiviini sock pattern was designed for the savonian knitting retreat kierot puikot 2015 --- **pattern features ** - knitted cuff down - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - instructions written in metric and us terminology - employs a technique called intarsia in the round detailed instructions included in the pattern - three sizes small 60 sts medium 66 sts and large 72 sts - charts but no written instructions for the lace pattern --- pattern **in french** available here 2 thank you laboutiqueuse 3 for your contribution 1 https //payhip com/b/390ag 2 http //laboutiqueuse canalblog com/archives/2016/10/14/34439507 html 3 http //www ravelry com/people/laboutiqueuse
